text: The Rezvani Tank is a mid-size SUV made by Rezvani since 2017. == First Generation (2017-2020) == The Rezvani Tank was revealed for the first time in 2017. around this time Rezvani decided to make a partnership with Jeep as a result the Rezvani Tank uses the plataform of the Jeep Wrangler. the Tank has a 6.4 liter hemi V8 petrol engine with a 8-speed automatic transmission. == Second Generation (2020-present) == The Second generation of the Rezvani Tank was revealed in 2019 this time its based on the Jl model of the Wrangler. and has a 6.2 liter V8 petrol engine from the Dodge Challenger and a 3.6 liter V6 petrol engine all with a 8-speed automatic transmission the Tank also have features Like bulletproof armour bulletproof glass and etc. == Markets == The Rezvani Tank is sold mainly in The American market. == References == Tank Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Rezvani Tank
